intro.speaker: Xalbador
intro.line: There's nothin' like war for the self-made man! No, sir! The strong rise to the top while the high-borns try to keep the blue blood inside 'em.

intro.speaker: Elder
intro.line: Hold, defiler! This is sacred ground! Your wickedness will be punished!

intro.speaker: Xalbador
intro.line: By who? The same gods that abandoned me when I was starving as a boy? When you see the gods, tell 'em I said they can rot in hell!

intro.speaker: Brady
intro.line: Dastard! I'll gut ya for that!

intro.speaker: Villager
intro.line: Brady, no! There's nothing you can do! Who would tend to the injured if we lost you?

intro.speaker: Villager
intro.line: We'll fight as best we're able! You help from the rear lines.

intro.speaker: Brady
intro.line: Ugh! Good people are dying, and I can't help! If only I could fight...

intro.speaker: Maribelle
intro.line: There're people fighting just over that ridge! LOTS of people!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: They look like they need help. Let's go, Shepherds!

battle.speaker: Villager
battle.line: H-help us! Please! The temple's beset by marauding bandits!

battle.speaker: Maribelle
battle.line: Don't you worry! We're happy to help! If there's one thing this world needs less of, it's wretched bandits…

battle.speaker: Brady
battle.line: Wait. I know that voice. Is that...Ma?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Haw haw haw! Oh, that's her. That's gotta be her.

recruit-talk.speaker: Maribelle
recruit-talk.line: Pardon me, you mannerless cur! I will not stand to be laughed at by a base scoundrel of your like!

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: ...Yep. That clinches it. You must be Maribelle.

recruit-talk.speaker: Maribelle
recruit-talk.line: And just how do you know that?! Do you leer at me from behind the shades of whatever den of iniquity you frequent?! Hmph! I bid you good day!

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: I guess you've always been like this. Still...it's good to see you again. And now that I've found ya, I'm afraid you're stuck with me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: An enemy?! Damn! Guess that's it for me... Sorry, Ma. Looks like I won't be home for supper after all. Do your worst, tyrant! I can't fight back anyway!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: You seem to be doing just fine to me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: I'm unarmed, genius! Sheesh, anyone with eyes can see that!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: And anyone with eyes knows there's more to combat than swinging a blade around. You fight in your own way. Am I wrong?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Pah! Don't patronize me! I'd love to fight more'n anything, but I can't seem to make it work.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: I'm sure something will come to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: ...Just who are you, anyway?

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: My name is Chrom.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: What? Y-you're Chrom?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: You know me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Ma wouldn't shut up about you!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Er, do I know your mother?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Her name's Maribelle.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: What?! So you're another traveler from the futu-

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: So you've already heard? Perfect. Now take me with ya already!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Er, well, I suppose we can find a place for you somewhere...

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Ha! I hear you there, chump! You can come kill me now. You're just lucky I don't have my old man's skill with a blade.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Your father is a swordsman?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: None of your damn business, dog!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Do you always speak this way to Ylissean royalty?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: I am Ylissean royalty!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: ... What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: ... Huh?

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Humor me here for a moment. What's your mother's name?

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Maribelle.

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Maribelle is my wife... Which would make you my son. Seems Lucina failed to mention this little detail.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: Huh. Yeah, I guess we look alike. I mean, if ya squint real hard... Sorry I called you a dog, Pop... Oh, and I'm Brady. Sooo... Must be disappointin' that your son can't fight, huh?

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: You seem to be doing just fine to me. And anyone with eyes knows there's more to combat than swinging a blade around. And besides, you've chosen to heal instead of harm. I couldn't be prouder of that.

recruit-talk.speaker: Brady
recruit-talk.line: ...Really? Aw, thanks. That means a lot, Pop.

boss.speaker: Xalbador
boss.line: You people can keep your gods. I'll put my faith in gold and steel!

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Thank you! Oh, thank you... You've kept this sacred place safe and spared the lives of those within.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: We just did what was right.

end.speaker: Elder
end.line: Would that everyone were so brave! Please, allow me to give you this.

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Hey, Ma.

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: What did you call me?

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: The name's Brady. I'm--

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: I'm sorry, but I only heal physical ailments. Broken bones and the like. You're clearly a deeply troubled individual whose diseased mind is beyond my healing.

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Stop talking for a minute and look at this!

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: That's... my ring! Then, that makes you...

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Right. Like I was trying to say, I'm--

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: A thief! A rapscallion! A common lowborne cutpurse! How dare you sneak in here and steal my prized possessions!

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Gawds! Stop interruptin' me for one blessed second, and check yer ring!

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: ...Oh. It's still here.

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: That clear things up any, Ma?"

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Everything save how I gave birth to a common thug!

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Aw, come on, Ma! That's harsh! Sure, I'm not the prettiest guy around, but I'm no thug, and I AM your son! ...And it's good to see you.

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: ...How did I ever permit my child to grow up referring to me as "Ma"?

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: You gave up tryin' after a decade or so.

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Well, can you at least ride? Have you read the classics? Do you play violin? Chess?!

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Yeah, all of the above. You beat all'a that junk into me.

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Glory be! My son is salvageable after all!

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: Uh... thanks?

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: "Don't look so forlorn, dear. You've come a long way, but Mother's here now. I'll take care of things from now on.

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: *Sniff* I missed you so much, Ma...

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Do not even THINK of crying! It does not befit one of your station! *Sniff* Plus, you'll set me off as well...

end.speaker: Brady
end.line: S-sorry, I just... I... Oh, Ma!

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Oh, Brady!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Oh, brother.
